AccessGate.title: Bride & Groom
AccessGate.description: This is a private invitation. Please enter the password to access the site.
AccessGate.passwordInfo: The password was sent with the invitation.

ceremony.title: Wedding Ceremony
ceremony.description: Here you will find a description of the place where the wedding ceremony will take place.

reception.title: Wedding Reception
reception.description: Here you will find a description of the place where the wedding reception will take place.

dressCode.title: Dress Code
dressCode.description: Here you will find information about the suggested attire for guests.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.description: Here you will find information regarding wedding gifts.

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information
additionalInfo.description: Any additional information for guests (e.g. about accommodation) will be listed here.

Gallery.description: Here you will find a description of your photo gallery.
Gallery.descriptionExtra: Additional description encouraging guests to share photos.

accommodation.a: Answer regarding the availability of accommodation for guests.

transport.a: Answer regarding directions or guest transport.

children.a: Answer regarding the presence of children at the wedding.

RSVP.footerText: We can't wait to see you!

form.messagePlaceholder: If you would like to tell us something...
form.emailError: Please provide a valid email address.

Story.quote: Your favorite quote or motto goes here...
Story.historyParagraph1: Here you will find a description of your story - how you met and what your common beginnings were.
Story.historyParagraph2: The next part of your story, important moments, and shared adventures.
Story.futureParagraph1: Description of your plans and what this special day means to you.
Story.futureParagraph2: Conclusion of the story, invitation to celebrate together in the chosen place.

rateLimit.title: Too Many Attempts
rateLimit.detail: Attempt limit reached. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

missingPassword.title: Missing Password
missingPassword.detail: Access password has not been configured. Contact the administrator.

missingSecret.title: Missing Access Secret
missingSecret.detail: WEDDING_ACCESS_SECRET is missing. Contact the administrator.

passwordRequired.title: Password Required
passwordRequired.detail: Please enter the password to gain access.

invalidPassword.title: Invalid Password
invalidPassword.detail: Try again or contact the administrator.

Metadata.title: Bride & Groom - Wedding Website
Metadata.description: Join us as we say 'I do'! We cordially invite you to the wedding of the Bride and the Groom. On this page you will find all the details of the ceremony, our story, and the RSVP form. See you there!

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.description: We are sorry, but the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. Return to the home page to continue viewing our wedding details.
